import axios from 'axios' import React, {Component} from 'react' import {FaTrashAlt} from "react-icons/fa" import {BiCheckbox, BiCheckboxSquare} from "react-icons/bi" import "./component_styling.sass" const Task = ({id, task, task_status, date, priority, update, undo, deleteTask}: {id: string, task: string, task_status: boolean, date: Date, priority: number, update : () => void, undo : () => void, deleteTask : () => void}) => { return (
{task_status ? : }

{task} - {task_status.toString()}

) } export default Task
